chunk:
Renee Rouleau Elderberry Soothing Toner

Brand: Renée Rouleau

Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: Water, Biosaccharide Gum-1, Cananga Odorata (Ylang Ylang) Flower Oil, Citric Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Pelargonium Graveolens (Geranium) Flower Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Polysorbate 20, Sambucus Nigra (Elderberry) Fruit Extract, Sodium PCA

Directio

Sodium PCA

Directions: To effectively use Elderberry Soothing Toner to deliver antioxidants to sensitive, aging skin, apply to Toning Cloth or cotton pad and wipe over entire face. Leave damp and proceed with a serum or moisturizer for your skin type.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer,
tions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
